official_title: A bill to provide for the duty-free entry of organs imported for the use of Trinity Cathedral of Cleveland, Ohio.

summary.text: Provides for the duty-free entry of certain organs imported during 1973 and 1978 for the use of a named cathedral in Ohio.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the duty-free entry of organs imported for the use of Trinity Cathedral of Cleveland, Ohio.
